query:
UPDATE node_aggregation_witness_jobs_fri
            SET
                status = 'queued',
                updated_at = NOW(),
                processing_started_at = NOW()
            WHERE
                (
                    status = 'in_progress'
                    AND processing_started_at <= NOW() - $1::INTERVAL
                    AND attempts < $2
                )
                OR (
                    status = 'failed'
                    AND attempts < $2
                )
            RETURNING
                id,
                status,
                attempts
